thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 8 of 504
thread.title: Madison

author: Madison
title: Madison
text: First of all, these leggings are so comfortable! I was on the hunt for new ones, and as I would normally pay around $50 for VS leggings, my first order was 2 for $24....depending on what you choose, you can save like $75! I then received an email saying I had a $50 credit to use. I was so confused because I didn't return anything....but it was just a "new member" gift I guess! So I got a free shirt. Love this company!
